data.message: Hey Em, why did you have to be a bitch ass follower on the trump bashing. Couldn't take the high road and shut your mouth. Listening to you for years, now I'm disgusted, especially after finding out your with Bitch Sean.

replies.message: So him having sean on a track for shady xv wasnt a clue for you?
Yea because this is any different then when he went at Bush?
Frank LaGaipa way to take an even lower road your mad at eminem for taking lol

Frank LaGaipa you're actually a total piece of shit why do u have a picture of eminem a young daughter ready to go? That's pretty creepy dude you should probably not let your neighbours know that you have that shit, but shit I'd hate to see the rest of your browser history now that  I think about it
